item.description:
Snowshoes required, I don't think microspikes will be right for this trail, but bring them in addition to the snowshoes.  I did this last week, microspikes were fine for the first half but snowshoes were necessary in between the 2 peaks, so we'll probably 'shoe it the whole way.

This is about 7 miles round trip.

I have a salty, black Toyota Corolla.  774-261-0691

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Snowshoe Pack and North Pack Monadnock
